N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 633.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for services

State Regulations
(a) No portion of any claim for reimbursement
for services may be supported solely by State funds if reimbursement may be
claimed from programs for which there is Federal participation. (b) Any claims for reimbursement related to a
portion of an activity or program for which Federal participation is available
which were not fully reimbursed as claimed and which were properly made at the
time they were originally claimed may be claimed as expenses for which Federal
participation is available pursuant to title XX of the Federal Social Security

Act or for other expenditures for which Federal participation is available if
such claims were appropriate when originally submitted. This subdivision shall
apply only when the revised claim is timely and not in excess of any ceiling or
limitation for Federal participation and an adjustment to reduce the original
claim is simultaneously submitted to the department. (c) Any claims for reimbursement for services
for which there is Federal participation but which were not reimbursed and
which were properly made, may be claimed as if Federal participation is not
available pursuant to this Part, if Federal participation is unavailable and if
such claims could have been submitted pursuant to this Part at the time they
were originally claimed, provided that the revised claim is timely and an
adjustment is simultaneously submitted to the department to reduce the original
claim. (d) Claims for reimbursement
authorized pursuant to this Part shall not be submitted if such claims seek
reimbursement at rates or amounts which are greater than otherwise permitted by
the department. (e) Any claims for
reimbursement submitted pursuant to this Part which are subsequently determined
by the department to be reimbursable from, or for which a higher proportion of

Federal participation could be received from, another program or activity shall
be reduced by an amount equivalent to the amount determined by the department
to be due from such program or activity. (f) Any adjustment of claims for
reimbursement, including adjustments to claims as a result of recoveries or
collections, shall be made in accordance with procedures, instructions or
directions of the department. Notes
